Weapons.Name: Dagger
Weapons.Description: A small blade that can be thrown or used for close combat.

Weapons.Name: Shortsword
Weapons.Description: A light one-handed blade favored by rogues and agile fighters.

Weapons.Name: Longsword
Weapons.Description: The standard weapon of knights and soldiers, versatile for one or two-handed use.

Weapons.Name: Mace
Weapons.Description: A blunt weapon with a heavy head, effective against armored foes.

Weapons.Name: Greatsword
Weapons.Description: A massive blade requiring two hands to wield effectively.

Weapons.Name: Short Bow
Weapons.Description: A compact bow designed for hunting and skirmishes.

Weapons.Name: Long Bow
Weapons.Description: A tall bow with exceptional range and power.

Weapons.Name: Crossbow
Weapons.Description: A mechanical ranged weapon that fires bolts with great force.

Weapons.Name: Warhammer
Weapons.Description: A heavy hammer designed for combat, capable of crushing armor.

Weapons.Name: Spear
Weapons.Description: A versatile weapon with a pointed tip, useful for keeping enemies at bay.

Weapons.Name: Short Bow Arrows
Weapons.Description: Arrows designed for use with a short bow.

Weapons.Name: Long Bow Arrows
Weapons.Description: Arrows designed for use with a long bow.

Weapons.Name: Crossbow Bolts
Weapons.Description: Bolts designed for use with a crossbow.

Armor.Name: Padded Armor
Armor.Description: Basic protection made from layers of quilted cloth.

Armor.Name: Leather Armor
Armor.Description: Hardened leather armor offering basic protection without restricting movement.

Armor.Name: Chain Mail
Armor.Description: Interlocking metal rings providing good protection against slashing attacks.

Armor.Name: Scale Mail
Armor.Description: Overlapping metal scales attached to a leather backing.

Armor.Name: Plate Armor
Armor.Description: Heavy interlocking plates providing excellent protection at the cost of mobility.

Armor.Name: Shield
Armor.Description: A wooden or metal shield held in one hand to deflect attacks.

AdventuringGear.Name: Backpack
AdventuringGear.Description: A leather pack with straps that can hold gear and supplies.

AdventuringGear.Name: Bedroll
AdventuringGear.Description: A lightweight sleeping roll for resting outdoors.

AdventuringGear.Name: Rations (1 day)
AdventuringGear.Description: Preserved food sufficient for one day of travel.

AdventuringGear.Name: Torch
AdventuringGear.Description: A wooden stick wrapped with cloth soaked in pitch.
Properties: Provides bright light in a 20 ft radius

AdventuringGear.Name: Lantern
AdventuringGear.Description: A hooded lantern that burns oil to provide light.
Properties: Provides bright light for 6 hours per pint of oil

AdventuringGear.Name: Rope (50 ft)
AdventuringGear.Description: Strong hemp rope useful for climbing and securing objects.

AdventuringGear.Name: Climber's Kit
AdventuringGear.Description: Includes pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness.

AdventuringGear.Name: Waterskin
AdventuringGear.Description: A container for holding water or other liquids.

AdventuringGear.Name: Flint & Steel
Properties: Can start a fire in 1 minute with dry kindling

AdventuringGear.Name: Healing Potion
AdventuringGear.Description: A ruby-red liquid that restores health when consumed.

AdventuringGear.Name: Thieves' Tools
AdventuringGear.Description: A set of tools for picking locks and disabling traps.

AdventuringGear.Name: Herbalism Kit
AdventuringGear.Description: A pouch containing various herbs, mortar and pestle, clippers, and other tools.
Properties: Used for crafting potions and poultices

AdventuringGear.Name: Spyglass
AdventuringGear.Description: A collapsible brass tube with lenses that allows long-distance viewing.
Properties: See up to 2 miles away with clarity

AdventuringGear.Name: Grappling Hook
AdventuringGear.Description: A metal hook with three or four prongs, used with a rope for climbing.
